snippet.title: Urban Strife - TBS Weapons Reinvented: The Handgun
snippet.description: In USG you will be able to enjoy real ballistics, with caliber based penetration, damage and bullet drop-off. In this episode of USG Weapons Testing we bring you the most underrated weapon in tactical games, the humble handgun, now reinvented as a vital tool in CQB combat. The handgun in USG brings low AP usage and excellent close range damage, outscoring most rifles in lethality up close. Just remember to keep your enemies close. Next episode, the king of home defense: the shotgun. WISLIST USG HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/710230/Urban_Strife/
